metadata.title: CVE-2024-31570 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In FreeImage library version 3.19.0 [r1909], when reading images in XPMformat, the Load() function has a stack overflow write vulnerability, whichmay lead to a command execution.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
